title: Still Funny: Why Do We Laugh?
description: Why do we laugh? Why do you feel ticklish when someone tickles you? Why can't you tickle yourself? In this episode, originally from 2018, we learn about how humor develops with Gina Mireault of the Infant Laughter Project at Northern Vermont University. Plus: April Fools traditions and we listen to jokes sent in by kids with Vermont comedian Josie Leavitt.
itunes:subtitle: Why do we laugh? Why do you feel ticklish when someone tickles you? Why can't you tickle yourself?
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
